description: Hierarchical task list with subtasks. PRDs preserved for reference.

ch12-deprecated.title: Case Studies & Reference (REMOVED)
ch12-deprecated.note: Replaced by ch15 Model Strategy. Case study content distributed to other chapters.

tasks.title: CRITICAL: Fix broken markdown links in ch09 Related Chapters
tasks.description: Chapter 9 (Context Engineering Deep Dive) has 2 broken markdown links in the Related Chapters section. Lines 591-592 need fixing: 1) ch08-error-handling-debugging.md → ch08-error-handling-and-debugging.md, 2) ch10-ralph-loop.md → ch10-the-ralph-loop.md. Flagged by cross-ref-validator-2026-01-28.
tasks.outcome: Fixed 2 broken links: ch08-error-handling-debugging.md → ch08-error-handling-and-debugging.md, ch10-ralph-loop.md → ch10-the-ralph-loop.md

tasks.title: CRITICAL: Resolve PRD title mismatch for ch07
tasks.description: prds/ch07.md is titled 'Chapter 7 PRD: Context Engineering Deep Dive' but the actual Chapter 7 is 'Quality Gates That Compound'. This is a major alignment issue. The PRD content discusses information theory, entropy, context windows, and progressive disclosure - which matches Chapter 9's actual content, not Chapter 7. Section numbering (4.1, 4.2) suggests file was copied without proper renumbering. Either: 1) Rename file to prds/ch09.md and update PRD numbering, OR 2) Rewrite ch07.md PRD to match Quality Gates content. Review flagged the mismatch. Flagged by cross-ref-validator-2026-01-28.
tasks.outcome: Updated prds/ch07.md title from 'Chapter 7 PRD' to 'Chapter 9 PRD' and added note explaining historical numbering. PRD content correctly aligns with ch09-context-engineering-deep-dive.md.

tasks.title: CRITICAL: Resolve PRD title mismatch for ch09
tasks.description: prds/ch09.md is titled 'Chapter 9 PRD: Sub-Agent Architecture' but actual Chapter 9 is 'Context Engineering Deep Dive'. Sub-Agent Architecture is actually Chapter 11. This indicates PRD files are misaligned with chapter numbers. The ch09.md PRD may belong to ch11 OR the ch07.md 'Context Engineering' content belongs to ch09. This is critical for PRD-chapter alignment verification. Flagged by cross-ref-validator-2026-01-28.
tasks.action: Investigate PRD numbering (ch07 and ch09 may be swapped or mislabeled)
tasks.outcome: Updated prds/ch09.md title from 'Chapter 9 PRD' to 'Chapter 11 PRD' and added note explaining historical numbering. PRD content correctly aligns with ch11-sub-agent-architecture.md.

tasks.title: CRITICAL: Fix broken markdown links in ch07 Related Chapters
tasks.description: Chapter 7 (Quality Gates That Compound) has 3 broken markdown links in the Related Chapters section. These links will fail when the book is processed or when readers click them. Lines 564-566 need fixing: 1) ch06-verification-ladder.md → ch06-the-verification-ladder.md, 2) ch08-error-handling.md → ch08-error-handling-and-debugging.md, 3) ch04-writing-your-first-claudemd.md → ch04-writing-your-first-claude-md.md. Flagged by cross-ref-validator-2026-01-28.
tasks.breakdownDetails: Fix 3 broken links (ch06, ch08, ch04 references)
tasks.outcome: Fixed all 3 broken links: ch06-verification-ladder.md → ch06-the-verification-ladder.md, ch08-error-handling.md → ch08-error-handling-and-debugging.md, ch04-writing-your-first-claudemd.md → ch04-writing-your-first-claude-md.md

tasks.title: CRITICAL: Fix undefined technical terms in Ch01
tasks.description: Chapter 1 uses several domain-driven design and infrastructure concepts without introducing them. Add definitions on first use for: 1) invariants (line 84), 2) bounded contexts (line 198), 3) idempotency/idempotent (line 291), 4) Infrastructure as code (line 89), 5) Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes (line 89 - add brief descriptions), 6) SQL (line 90). Review flagged by term-intro-checker-2026-01-27.
tasks.outcome: Fixed 5 term introductions: invariants (line 84), IaC/Terraform/Docker/Kubernetes (line 89), SQL (line 90), bounded contexts (line 186), idempotency (line 291)

tasks.title: CRITICAL: Fix undefined MTok abbreviation in Ch15
tasks.description: Chapter 15 (Model Strategy & Cost Optimization) uses 'MTok' (million tokens) as abbreviation throughout pricing examples (lines 18-234) without ever defining what it means. Add clear definition at first occurrence in line 18: 'Million tokens (MTok)'. Critical for reader comprehension when explaining API pricing. Review flagged by term-intro-checker-2026-01-27.
tasks.outcome: Added definition 'million tokens (MTok)' at first use on line 18

tasks.title: Create exercises folder structure
tasks.description: Set up exercises/ folder with per-chapter subfolders. Create exercises/README.md explaining structure. Update CLAUDE.md with exercise conventions. Each chapter should have 2-3 Try It Yourself exercises.
tasks.outcome: Created 15 chapter folders (ch01-ch15), each with README.md and solutions/ subfolder. Main exercises/README.md already existed.

tasks.title: Create Signal Processing Harness diagram
tasks.description: Visualize the four-layer harness model as a signal processing system that filters noise and amplifies signal. Shows noise reduction at each layer with failure rate improvements (30-50% → <1%). Lines 7-17 in chapter.

tasks.title: Create Four Levels of Automation diagram
tasks.description: Visualization of productivity progression from Level 0 (manual, 1x) through Level 3 (meta-infrastructure, 100-500x). Shows ROI and where most developers stop. Lines 433-441 in chapter.
tasks.outcome: Created multi-view diagram: productivity staircase (primary), multiplier ladder, ROI table, opportunity cost visualization, and 'why developers stop' analysis

tasks.title: Create Leverage Stack pyramid diagram
tasks.description: Stacked pyramid showing what to keep sharp (understanding, design, verification), what to delegate (implementation patterns), and what to forget (syntax, boilerplate). Lines 250-266 in chapter. Already exists as ASCII art.
tasks.outcome: Created multi-view diagram: skill pyramid (primary), action-oriented categories, self-check questions table, atrophy consequences, investment vs returns table, three pillars visualization

tasks.title: Create Atrophy Ladder career ceiling diagram
tasks.description: Ladder showing 5 career levels based on skill retention during AI-assisted development. Shows Level 4 (Senior Engineer) as minimum safe level, Level 5 (Architect) with no ceiling. Lines 281-300 in chapter. Already exists as ASCII art.
tasks.outcome: Created multi-view diagram: career ladder (primary), skill capability matrix, three core skills, career safety zone, self-assessment questions, what each level looks like, career trajectory over time

tasks.title: Create Task Decomposition comparison diagram
tasks.description: Before/after comparison: monolithic task (agent fails) vs decomposed tasks (agent succeeds). Shows 8 smaller tasks with clear boundaries vs one 15-step block. Lines 333-356 in chapter.
tasks.outcome: Created multi-view diagram: before/after comparison (primary), task sizing guidelines, decomposition decision tree, failure mode analysis table, 8-task migration example, why oversizing causes failure, task designer mindset table

tasks.title: Agent SDK Migration: Ch06-Ch15 Code Examples
